ComicInfo.Title: Sunstroke; Robert Redford; The Demon of the Eiffel Tower Chapter II; "December 13th." (Chapter 6); Chapter VI: Terra; Diary of a Fullerette; Chapter V: Fragments
ComicInfo.Summary:
Featured in this issue is the conclusion to Schuiten and Peeter's fascinating tale of urban growth gone wild, Fever in Urbican, as well as more classic work by Jacques Tardi, the continuation of Phillipe Druillet's cosmic saga Lone Sloane, new work by cartoonist Rick Geary, a specially designed fold-out poster by Moebius, plus much more! Classic comic books never looked so good!
Story TitlesSunstrokeThe Adventures of Fred & BobRobert RedfordThe Extraordinary Adventures of Adele Blanc-Sec: The Demon of the Eiffel Tower Chapter 2Fever in Urbicand Chapter 6Lone Sloane Chapter 6: TerraDiary of FulleretteRork Chapter 5
